title: MOOC-Based Advanced Mathematics Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning Emphasizing Work Relevance for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can enhance mathematical problem-solving skills by over 80% through systematic instructor feedback (weekly video comments) on a MOOC platform.
Learners cultivate the ability to explain complex mathematical concepts through collaborative problem-solving activities with peer learners (participating in discussion forums twice a week).
Learners develop and apply strategies (utilizing peer assessment systems) to maintain social connectedness in non-face-to-face environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
